definition: to draw a bow to the full/the range of a bow and arrow/old variant of 夠|够[gou4], enough
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc
within the range of a bow and arrow/(fig.) under sb's control
able to do sth/in a position to do sth/same as 能夠|能够

sentences.english: We get absorbed in discussion for several hours every time we meet.
sentences.chinese: 我们每次见面都会入彀地谈上几个小时。

sentences.english: Lebanon is not sufficient for altar fires, nor its animals enough for burnt offerings.
sentences.chinese: 利巴嫩的树林不彀当柴烧，其中的走兽也不彀作燔祭。

sentences.english: Lebanon is not sufficient for altar fires, nor its animals enough for burnt offerings.
sentences.chinese: 利巴嫩的树林不彀当柴烧，其中的走兽也不彀作燔祭。

sentences.english: Even scientists who recognize it can fall prey.
sentences.chinese: 甚至认识到这一现象的科学家也可能落入彀中。

sentences.english: After years of training, his performance increasingly conforms to normal standards.
sentences.chinese: 经过多年训练，他的表演日益入彀。

sentences.english: A person to help them learn computer think of a way to surf the Internet and customers.
sentences.chinese: 一个学电脑地人协助他们想啦个方法，上彀找客户。

sentences.english: But, accessing the internet is advantageous , but also has shortcoming.
sentences.chinese: 但是，上彀是有利也有弊。

sentences.english: I tried to trap him, but I didn't succeed.
sentences.chinese: 我曾试图引他入彀，但都没有成功。

sentences.english: This section of my work too busy to be online, and miss you very much.
sentences.chinese: 这一段自己工作很忙，没很上彀，也很驰念你。

sentences.english: Without noticing, he has entered the shooting range of his opponent.
sentences.chinese: 不知不觉地落入了对手的彀中。

sentences.english: He is leading thee. There are lessons that can be learned only there.
sentences.chinese: 你有许多功课只能彀在那边学得的。

sentences.english: She has never got online since been warned not to make friends there.
sentences.chinese: 被正告不要在网上结交后，她不再上彀。

definition: sack/tube open at both ends/(onom.) footsteps
